changeSet.author: suresh
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS AggregatorEnrollmentData ( data LONGBLOB NULL DEFAULT NULL, uuid VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL, creationtime DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, creator VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, modifiedtime DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, modifier VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, version INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (uuid)) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = latin1;

changeSet.author: suresh
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS DrasLoginInformation ( drasusername VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, draspassword VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, uuid VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL, creationtime DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, creator VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, modifiedtime DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, modifier VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, version INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (uuid)) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = latin1;

changeSet.author: suresh
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS LeadAccountInformation ( leadaccountname VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, leadaccountemail VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, leadaccountphonenumber VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, leadaccountnumber VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, uuid VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL, creationtime DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, creator VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, modifiedtime DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, modifier VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, version INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, description VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (uuid)) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = latin1;

changeSet.author: suresh
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS AggregatorEnrollmentRequest ( isexistingaggregator TINYINT(1) NOT NULL, requestId VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, leadaccountinformation_uuid VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL, draslogininfo_uuid VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL, aggregatorenrollmentdata_uuid VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL, uuid VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL, creationtime DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, creator VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, modifiedtime DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, modifier VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, version INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, status VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL, operatorid VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL, operatoremailid VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL, operatorrole VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL, apistatus VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (uuid), INDEX fk_aggregatorenrollmentrequest_aggregatorenrollmentdata_id (aggregatorenrollmentdata_uuid ASC), INDEX fk_aggregatorenrollmentrequest_leadaccountinfo_id (leadaccountinformation_uuid ASC), INDEX fk_aggregatorenrollmentrequest_draslogininfo_id (draslogininfo_uuid ASC), CONSTRAINT fk_aggregatorenrollmentrequest_aggregatorenrollmentdata_id FOREIGN KEY (aggregatorenrollmentdata_uuid) REFERENCES AggregatorEnrollmentData (uuid) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT fk_aggregatorenrollmentrequest_draslogininfo_id FOREIGN KEY (draslogininfo_uuid) REFERENCES DrasLoginInformation (uuid) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT fk_aggregatorenrollmentrequest_leadaccountinfo_id FOREIGN KEY (leadaccountinformation_uuid) REFERENCES LeadAccountInformation (uuid) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = latin1 COMMENT = ' ';

changeSet.author: suresh
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CustomerEnrollmentData ( uuid VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL, customername VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, customeremail VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, customerphonenumber VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, customeraddress VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, customerserviceacc VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, customercontactname1 VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, customercontactemail1 VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, customercontactphone1 VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, customercontactname2 VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, customercontactemail2 VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, customercontactphone2 VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, creationtime DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, creator VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, modifiedtime DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, modifier VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, version INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (uuid)) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = latin1;

changeSet.author: suresh
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS DeviceInformation ( uuid VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL, deviceinfoclientmanufacturer VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, deviceinfodvcmodelversion VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, deviceinfooadrversion VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, deviceinfoclientpassword VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, deviceinfopendingsignalused TINYINT(1) NOT NULL, creationtime DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, creator VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, modifiedtime DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, modifier VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, version INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, deviceInfoProgramType VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (uuid)) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = latin1;

changeSet.author: suresh
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS TechnicalContact ( uuid VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL, technicalcontactcompany VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, technicalcontactname VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, technicalcontactemail VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, technicalcontactphonenumber VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, technicalcontactdescription VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL, creationtime DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, creator VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, modifiedtime DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, modifier VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, version INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (uuid)) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = latin1;

changeSet.author: suresh
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CustomerEnrollmentRequest ( uuid VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL, creationtime DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, creator VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, modifiedtime DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, modifier VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, version INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, requestid VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, deviceinformation_uuid VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL, draslogin_uuid VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL, technicalcontact_uuid VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL, customerenrollmendata_uuid VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL, operatorid VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL, operatoremailid VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL, operatorrole VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (uuid), INDEX fk_customer_deviceinformation_id (deviceinformation_uuid ASC), INDEX fk_customer_draslogin_id (draslogin_uuid ASC), INDEX fk_customer_technicalcontact_id (technicalcontact_uuid ASC), INDEX fk_customer_customerenrollmentdata_id (customerenrollmendata_uuid ASC), CONSTRAINT fk_customer_customerenrollmentdata_id FOREIGN KEY (customerenrollmendata_uuid) REFERENCES CustomerEnrollmentData (uuid) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT fk_customer_deviceinformation_id FOREIGN KEY (deviceinformation_uuid) REFERENCES DeviceInformation (uuid) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT fk_customer_draslogin_id FOREIGN KEY (draslogin_uuid) REFERENCES DrasLoginInformation (uuid) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT fk_customer_technicalcontact_id FOREIGN KEY (technicalcontact_uuid) REFERENCES TechnicalContact (uuid) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = latin1 COMMENT = ' ';

changeSet.author: suresh
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ParticipantPrograms ( uuid VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, customerid VARCHAR(128) NULL DEFAULT NULL, programName VARCHAR(128) NULL DEFAULT NULL, creationtime DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, creator VARCHAR(128) NULL DEFAULT NULL, modifiedtime DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, modifier VARCHAR(128) NULL DEFAULT NULL, version INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (uuid)) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = latin1;
